The following year, Alito conspicuously noted that stare decisis, the legal term of art for respecting precedent, was not an inexorable command.? At the time, it was noted that Alito was echoing former Chief Justice WILLIAM REHNQUIST's use of the same phrase in his 1992 dissent in Casey, calling for the overturning of Roe.
